query.mssql: CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX {1} ON {0} ( [Status] ASC, [Discriminator] ASC, [Performer] ASC ) INCLUDE ( [Deadline], [MainTask], [IsCollapsed_Docflow_Sungero], [IsConfSigning_Docflow_Sungero], [IsSubmission_Docflow_Sungero], [IsCollapsedRev_Docflow_Sungero]) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
query.postgres: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {1} ON {0} (Status, Discriminator, Performer, Deadline, MainTask, IsCollapsed_Docflow_Sungero, IsConfSigning_Docflow_Sungero, IsSubmission_Docflow_Sungero, IsCollapsedRev_Docflow_Sungero)

query.mssql: CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX {1} ON {0} ( [Discriminator] ASC, [Status] ASC, [Supervisor_RecMan_Sungero] ASC ) INCLUDE ( [MainTask], [IsCompound_RecMan_Sungero]) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
query.postgres: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {1} ON {0} (discriminator, status, supervisor_recman_sungero, actionitemtype_recman_sungero)
